Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller()
      Initializes a new Controller object with empty lists of users and products and new instances of IdGenerator and AdGenerator.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller()
        Initializes a new Controller object with empty lists of users and products and new instances of IdGenerator and AdGenerator.

    • Method Detail

      • searchUserById

        public User searchUserById(java.lang.String userId)
        Searches for a user with the given user ID in the list of users. Returns the found User object or null if not found.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user ID to search for
        Returns:
        the found User object or null if not found

      • validateUserId

        public boolean validateUserId(java.lang.String userId)
        Validates a given user ID by checking if it exists in the list of users. Returns true if the user ID is not found and false if it is found.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user ID to validate
        Returns:
        true if the user ID is not found and false if it is found

      • validateProductId

        public boolean validateProductId(java.lang.String productId)
        Validates a given product ID by checking if it exists in the list of products using the `searchProductById` method. Returns true if the product ID is found and false if it is not found.
        Parameters:
        productId - the product ID to validate
        Returns:
        true if the product ID is found and false if it is not found

      • addUser

        public java.lang.String addUser(java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.String userId,
                                java.lang.String userTypeInStr)
        Adds a new user with the given name, user ID, and user type to the list of users if the user ID is valid. Returns a message indicating success or failure.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the new user
        userId - the user ID of the new user
        userTypeInStr - the user type of the new user as a string
        Returns:
        a message indicating success or failure

      • addBook

        public java.lang.String addBook(java.lang.String name,
                                int numPages,
                                double value,
                                java.util.GregorianCalendar publicationDate,
                                java.lang.String url,
                                java.lang.String genreInStr,
                                java.lang.String review)
        Adds a new book with the given parameters to the list of products if a new ID can be generated. Returns a message indicating success or failure.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the book
        numPages - the number of pages in the book
        value - the value of the book
        publicationDate - the publication date of the book
        url - the URL of the book
        genreInStr - the genre of the book as a string
        review - a review of the book
        Returns:
        a message indicating success or failure

      • addMagazine

        public java.lang.String addMagazine(java.lang.String name,
                                    int numPages,
                                    double value,
                                    java.util.GregorianCalendar publicationDate,
                                    java.lang.String url,
                                    java.lang.String categoryInStr,
                                    java.lang.String publicationFrequency)
        Adds a new magazine with the given parameters to the list of products if a new ID can be generated. Returns a message indicating success or failure.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the magazine
        numPages - the number of pages in the magazine
        value - the value of the magazine
        publicationDate - the publication date of the magazine
        url - the URL of the magazine
        categoryInStr - the category of the magazine as a string
        publicationFrequency - the publication frequency of the magazine
        Returns:
        a message indicating success or failure

        Parameters:
        userId - the ID of the user
        productId - the ID of the product to add
        Returns:
        a message indicating whether the product was successfully added

        public BibliographicProduct searchProductById(java.lang.String id)
        Searches for a product by its ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the product to search for
        Returns:
        the product with the specified ID, or null if no such product is found

      • deleteProductToUser

        public java.lang.String deleteProductToUser(java.lang.String userId,
                                            java.lang.String productId)
        Deletes a product from a user's list of products. The product must be a magazine.
        Parameters:
        userId - the ID of the user
        productId - the ID of the product to delete
        Returns:
        a message indicating whether the product was successfully deleted

      • getProductTypeFlag

        public int getProductTypeFlag(java.lang.String id)
        Returns an integer indicating the type of a product.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the product
        Returns:
        0 if the product is not found, 1 if the product is a book, 2 if the product is a magazine

      • modifyProduct

        public void modifyProduct(java.lang.String productId,
                          int field,
                          java.lang.String newStatus)
        Modifies a product by updating one of its fields.
        Parameters:
        productId - the ID of the product to modify
        field - the field to update (1 for name, 2 for URL, 3 for genre/category, 4 for review/publication frequency)
        newStatus - the new value to set for the specified field

      • modifyProduct

        public void modifyProduct(java.lang.String productId,
                          int field,
                          int newStatus)
        Modifies a product by updating one of its fields.
        Parameters:
        productId - the ID of the product to modify
        field - the field to update (5 for number of pages, 6 for number of read pages, 7 for number of solds)
        newStatus - the new value to set for the specified field

      • modifyProduct

        public void modifyProduct(java.lang.String productId,
                          int field,
                          double newStatus)
        Modifies a product by updating one of its fields.
        Parameters:
        productId - the ID of the product to modify
        field - the field to update (8 for value)
        newStatus - the new value to set for the specified field

      • modifyProduct

        public void modifyProduct(java.lang.String productId,
                          int field,
                          java.util.GregorianCalendar newStatus)
        Modifies a product by updating one of its fields.
        Parameters:
        productId - the ID of the product to modify
        field - the field to update (9 for publication date)
        newStatus - the new value to set for the specified field

      • initObjects

        public void initObjects(int num)
        Initializes objects by creating a specified number products(books/magazines). It also register a regular user with id 1, and a premium user with id 2
        Parameters:
        num - the number of products to create

      • initUsers

        public void initUsers()
        Initializes users by creating two users with id=1 and id=2 if they do not already exist.

      • deleteProduct

        public java.lang.String deleteProduct(java.lang.String id)
        Deletes a product by its ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the product to delete
        Returns:
        a message indicating whether the product was successfully deleted

      • readingSessionAd

        public boolean readingSessionAd(java.lang.String userId,
                                java.lang.String productId,
                                int page)
        Determines whether an advertisement should be shown during a reading session.
        Parameters:
        userId - the ID of the user
        productId - the ID of the product
        page - the number of readPages
        Returns:
        true if an advertisement should be shown, false otherwise

      • getReadingSessionInfo

        public java.lang.Object[] getReadingSessionInfo(java.lang.String productId)
        Returns information about a reading session for a product.
        Parameters:
        productId - the ID of the product
        Returns:
        an array containing the name and number of pages of the product

      • getAd

        public java.lang.String getAd()
        Returns an advertisement.
        Returns:
        a string representing an advertisement

      • getLibrary

        public java.lang.String[][][] getLibrary(java.lang.String userId)
        Returns a user's library.
        Parameters:
        userId - the ID of the user
        Returns:
        a 3D array representing the user's library

      • userHasProduct

        public boolean userHasProduct(java.lang.String userId,
                              java.lang.String productId)
        Determines if a user has a specified product.
        Parameters:
        userId - the ID of the user to search for
        productId - the ID of the product to search for
        Returns:
        true if the user has the specified product, false otherwise
